summary.span: 允許以程式設計方式存取伺服器上的 HTML 項目。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用建立顯示影像的按鈕控制項。Use the control to create a button that displays an image. 您可以透過程式設計方式控制相關聯的動作藉由提供的事件處理常式的控制項事件。You can programmatically control the action associated with the control by providing an event handler for the event. 以便使用者按一下的座標控制項可以透過使用並的屬性做為參數傳遞至使用者定義的事件處理常式的物件。The coordinates where the user clicks an control can be determined by using the and properties of the object that is passed as a parameter to the user-defined event handler. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建立顯示影像的按鈕控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to create a button that displays an image. > [!NOTE] > 您必須提供您自己的映像檔，此範例正常運作。You must provide your own image files for this example to work correctly. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式來建立和初始化的新執行個體控制項。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the control. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"Image"常值字串。The "image" literal string.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立的新執行個體控制，並將它放在網頁上。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the control and place it on the Web page. span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of the control in relation to other elements on the Web page.

value.span: 和 Web 網頁上其他項目相關的 控制項之對齊方式。

span.span: The alignment of the control in relation to other elements on the Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的對齊方式在網頁上其他項目相關的控制項。Use the property to specify the alignment of the control in relation to the other elements on the Web page. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的對齊方式在網頁上其他項目相關的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alignment of the control in relation to other elements on the Web page. summary.span: 取得或設定在沒有影像或尚未下載完成時，瀏覽器將顯示的替代文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the alternative text that the browser displays if the image is unavailable or has not been downloaded.
The alternative text for the specified image.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要顯示時指定的映像無法使用或尚未下載的文字。Use the property to specify the text to display when the specified image is not available or has not been downloaded. 您也可以使用這個屬性，以程式設計方式判斷指定的替代文字。You can also use this property to programmatically determine the specified alternative text. 在瀏覽器支援的工具提示功能，這段文字也會顯示為工具提示控制項。In browsers that support the ToolTip feature, this text also appears as a ToolTip for the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要顯示的映像無法使用時的替代文字。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alternate text to display when the image is not available. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the border width for the control.

value.span: 控制項的框線寬度 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The border width, in pixels, for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的框線寬度控制項。Use the property to specify the border width for the control. > [!NOTE] > 在所有瀏覽器不支援這個屬性。This property is not supported in all browsers. 請檢查您的瀏覽器，來判斷相容性。Check your browser to determine compatibility. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的框線寬度控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the border width for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputImage.Align Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.Align Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputImage.Align Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.Align Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

.property instance bool CausesValidation
Public Overridable Property CausesValidation As Boolean

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出按一下 控制項時，是否執行驗證。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the control is clicked.

value.span: 如果按一下 控制項時會執行驗證，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if validation is performed when the control is clicked; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，會執行頁面驗證時按一下控制項時。By default, page validation is performed when an control is clicked. 頁面驗證判斷輸入的控制項要與驗證控制項在頁面上，所有通過驗證的控制項所指定的驗證規則相關聯。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 您可以指定或判斷是否在用戶端和伺服器上執行驗證時藉由按下控制項屬性。You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when an control is clicked by using the property. 若要避免執行驗證，將屬性設`false`。To prevent validation from being performed, set the property to `false`. 這個屬性常用的事件處理常式的以防止頁面驗證時按一下 [取消] 或重設按鈕時所發生的事件。This property is commonly used in the event handler for the event to prevent page validation from occurring when a Cancel or Reset button is clicked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以防止發生頁面驗證。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent page validation from occurring. 請注意如何方法會獨立啟用每個驗證控制項。Notice how the method activates each validation control independently. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputImageCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageCausesValidation/CS/htmlinputimagecausesvalidationcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputImageCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageCausesValidation/VB/htmlinputimagecausesvalidationvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The key identifier for the control.

summary.span: 處理 控制項的回傳資料。

span.span: Processes the postback data for the control.

returns.span: 如果回傳的結果改變了 控制項的狀態，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the control's state has changed as a result of the postback; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會檢查是否代表已由使用者所按下映像的位置的座標屬於的回傳資料控制項。The method checks to see whether coordinates that represent the location where the image was clicked by the user are part of the postback data for the control. 如果座標是部分回傳的資料，則方法會註冊與網頁做為需要時處理引發事件的控制項的控制項。If coordinates are part of the postback data, then the method registers the control with the Web page as a control that requires an event to be raised when it is processed. > [!NOTE] > 原點座標 (0，0) 位於影像的左上角。The origin coordinates (0,0) are located in the upper-left corner of the image. 方法主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

override this.OnPreRender : EventArgs -> unit

span.span: An that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫之前轉譯控制項。The method is called just prior to rendering the control. 方法主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，讓它永遠都會顯示自訂無框線使用的伺服器控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that it always displays a custom server control with no border. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputimage_onprerendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputimage_onprerendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputimage_onprerender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputimage_onprerender.vb#2)]

span.para: 當覆寫方法在衍生類別中，務必呼叫基底類別的方法，好讓註冊的委派能接收事件。
When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: An that contains event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者按一下時，會引發事件控制項。The event is raised when the user clicks an control. 以便使用者按一下的座標控制項可以透過使用並的屬性物件。The coordinates where the user clicks an control can be determined by using the and properties of the object. 物件做為參數傳遞至使用者定義的事件處理常式。The object is passed as a parameter to the user-defined event handler. > [!NOTE] > 原點 （0，0） 是位於影像的左上角。The origin (0, 0) is located at the upper-left corner of the image. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件，以判斷使用者按一下處的座標控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to determine the coordinates where the user clicks the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputImageServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageServerClick/CS/htmlinputimageserverclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputImageServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageServerClick/VB/htmlinputimageserverclickvb.aspx#1)]

span.para: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由控制項，它按下時，引發事件。The method is used by the control, when it is clicked, to raise a event. 如果屬性是`true`;方法呼叫使用中指定的控制項群組屬性。If the property is `true`; the method is called using the group of controls specified in the property. 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的控制項。This method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

summary.span: 通知 控制項已變更控制項的狀態。

span.span: Notifies the control that the state of the control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不會參與處理控制項中而且是為了完成介面實作。The method does not participate in the processing of the control and is included to complete the interface implementation. 方法主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

summary.span: 將 控制項的屬性轉譯為指定的 物件。

span.span: Renders the control's attributes to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會解析中設定的 URL屬性，將寫入`onclick`屬性轉譯控制如果屬性是`true`，以及最後會呼叫基底方法。The method resolves the URL set in the property, writes the `onclick` attribute of the rendered control if the property is `true`, and finally calls the base method. 如果值屬性是不正確的 URL，擲回例外狀況。If the value of the property is a malformed URL, an exception is thrown. 方法主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中的自訂伺服器控制項，使特定替代文字，可做為工具提示中，一律會顯示與。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that specific alternate text, accessible as a ToolTip, is always displayed with the . [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlInputImageRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputImageRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlinputimage_renderattributescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlInputImageRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputImageRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlinputimage_renderattributesvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlInputImageRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputImageRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlinputimage_renderattributes.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlInputImageRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputImageRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlinputimage_renderattributes.vb#2)]

exception.span: 屬性包含不正確的 URL。

span.span: The property contains a malformed URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者按一下時，會引發事件控制項。The event is raised when the user clicks an control. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件，以判斷使用者按一下處的座標控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to determine the coordinates where the user clicks the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputImageServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageServerClick/CS/htmlinputimageserverclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputImageServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageServerClick/VB/htmlinputimageserverclickvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定影像檔的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location of the image file.
The location of the image file.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要顯示之影像的位置控制項。Use the property to specify the location of the image to display in the control. 如果找不到映像，在指定的文字屬性會顯示。If the image is not available, the text specified in the property is displayed. 您可以使用相對或絕對的 URL。You can use a relative or absolute URL. 相對的 URL 與相關的網頁位置的映像的位置，但未指定伺服器上的完整路徑。A relative URL relates the location of the image to the location of the Web page without specifying a complete path on the server. 路徑是相對於網頁的位置。The path is relative to the location of the Web page. 這可讓您更輕鬆地將整個網站到另一個目錄移伺服器上，而不需要更新程式碼中的映像的路徑。This makes it easier to move the entire site to another directory on the server without updating the path to the image in code. 您可以使用相對路徑" `~/` 」 來參考目前頁面所在的虛擬目錄。You can use the relative path " `~/` " to refer to the current virtual directory where the page is located. 例如，值for `` "XspTest 」 中的頁面上的虛擬目錄是``。For example, the value of for `` on a page in the "XspTest" virtual directory is ``. 絕對 URL 提供的完整路徑。An absolute URL provides the complete path. 因此，將網站移至另一個目錄，您必須更新程式碼。Therefore, moving the site to another directory requires that you update the code. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的路徑中所顯示之影像控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the path to an image displayed in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ValidationGroup { get; set; }
.property instance string ValidationGroup
Public Overridable Property ValidationGroup As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ValidationGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ValidationGroup : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項群組， 控制項會在回傳至伺服器時，針對這個群組進行驗證。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 控制項群組， 控制項會在回傳至伺服器時，針對這個群組進行驗證。

span.span: The group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示未設定這個屬性。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), indicating that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證群組可讓您將在頁面上的驗證控制項指派給特定的類別。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每個驗證群組可以單獨驗證，從其他頁面上的驗證群組。Each validation group can be validated independently from other validation groups on the page. 使用屬性來指定驗證群組的名稱，回傳至伺服器時，控制項引發驗證。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 這個屬性沒有作用時，才的值屬性設定為`true`。This property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 當您指定的值屬性，只是指定群組的成員的驗證控制項會驗證當控制項回傳至伺服器。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果您未指定此屬性的值而屬性設定為`true`，當控制項回傳至伺服器時，會驗證所有頁面上不會指派給驗證群組的驗證控制項。If you do not specify a value for this property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要驗證時的控制項控制項回傳至伺服器。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the controls to validate when an control posts back to the server. 頁面包含從使用者擷取資料的兩個文字方塊和兩個控制，以確保該使用者不會離開 [文字] 方塊空白。The page contains two text boxes to capture data from the user and two controls to ensure that the user does not leave a text box blank. 控制項的第一個文字方塊位於`CityInfoGroup`驗證群組和控制中的第二個方塊是`StateInfoGroup`驗證群組。The control for the first text box is in the `CityInfoGroup` validation group and the control for the second box is in the `StateInfoGroup` validation group. 當`CityQueryButton`按下時，只有在控制`CityInfoGroup`驗證群組會進行驗證。When the `CityQueryButton` is clicked, only the control in the `CityInfoGroup` validation group is validated. 當`StateQueryButton`按下時，只有在控制`StateInfoGroup`驗證群組會進行驗證。When the `StateQueryButton` is clicked, only the control in the `StateInfoGroup` validation group is validated. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputImageValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageValidationGroup/cs/htmlinputimagevalidationgroupcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputImageValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageValidationGroup/vb/htmlinputimagevalidationgroupvb.aspx#1)]
